content.query:
-- Create an external file format for DELIMITED (CSV/TSV) files.
CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT csv_file_format1
WITH (
        FORMAT_TYPE = DELIMITEDTEXT, 
        FORMAT_OPTIONS ( 
            FIELD_TERMINATOR = ',',
            STRING_DELIMITER = '"',
            FIRST_ROW = 2,
            USE_TYPE_DEFAULT = FALSE,
            ENCODING = 'UTF8',
            PARSER_VERSION='2.0'
     ));
